Services.title: What We do?
Services.titleImageAlt: A picture of a dev team
Services.slogan:
I focus on helping your brand grow
and move forward

items.title: Design
items.description: A design service provides professional expertise in creating visually appealing and functional designs for various purposes, helping businesses and individuals effectively communicate their message and enhance their brand image. Through careful research and thoughtful design choices, designers create unique and impactful visual experiences that resonate with the target audience.

items.title: Development
items.description: A development service provides professional expertise in creating websites, applications, and other digital products that are user-friendly, secure, effective, and built with the latest technologies and industry best practices. Developers write clean and efficient code, implement robust functionalities, and ensure seamless integration across different platforms and devices.

items.title: Deployment
items.description: A deployment service provides professional expertise in deploying, configuring, and optimizing websites, applications, and other digital products to ensure smooth and efficient operation. Deployments are carefully planned and executed, considering scalability, performance, and security requirements.

items.title: Support
items.description: A support service provides professional expertise in providing technical support, troubleshooting, and bug fixing for websites, applications, and other digital products to ensure uninterrupted functionality and user satisfaction. Support teams are responsive and knowledgeable, providing timely assistance to resolve issues and address user concerns.

items.title: Maintenance
items.description: A maintenance service provides professional expertise in regularly updating, monitoring, and optimizing websites, applications, and other digital products to ensure optimal performance, security, and stability. Regular maintenance activities include bug fixes, security patches, performance optimizations, and database management.

items.title: Consulting
items.description: A consulting service provides professional expertise in offering strategic advice, guidance, and recommendations to businesses and individuals on various aspects related to design, development, and digital transformation. Consultants leverage their industry knowledge and experience to help clients make informed decisions and achieve their business goals.

items.name: Game Hub
items.description: A simplified replica of the RAWG's site, which uses the non-commercial access of their API. This is a hobby project realizes at my free time. The project uses the latest versions of Next.js (13.6), Tailwind CSS, Shadcn/ui. It offers a color theme selector, two gallery modes (hover and click), advanced image caching, multi-level responsive design, data filters, data search capabilities, and much more.

items.name: Weather Forecast
items.description: A simple Weather forecast application, which uses the One Call API 3.0 of Openweathermap.org. The purpose of the project is to satisfy an exam task for a job interview.

items.name: Promptopia
items.description: Platform that serves as a hub for exchanging AI prompts in a format similar to blog posts. The project is written with TypeScript and is hosted on Vercel, utilizing MongoDB/Atlas as its database solution. For the front-end, React and Tailwind CSS have been employed, all powered by Next.js with the efficient 'app router' implementation. On the back-end side, I've utilized the Next.js's serverless functions and next-auth for authentication. It's multilingual-ready with next-intl for localization.

items.name: Appstimate.io
items.description: An application that offers a free and efficient app cost calculator to help you estimate the financial investment required for your app development project. This is my inaugural professional project, utilizing cutting-edge technologies such as Typescript, Next.js, Material UI, MongoDB, and more. The project was creates while I was employer at Browserbite.io, so it is their property.

items.name: StarWars API Search
items.description: This is my first touch with TypeScript. It was a task on the entrance exam at Browserbite.io.

items.name: Hyperzon
items.description: Refactoring and polish Hyperzon's site and convert it to a SPA with custom MVC. Hyperzon is a full service amazon marketing agency.
